      • setColor

        public void setColor(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        This method sets the color for all components. Selected components will be blue, others black.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics class

      • createDialogBox

        public DialogBox createDialogBox(ViewInteraction viewInteraction,
                                 int x,
                                 int y)
        Create a dialogbox for the viewcomponent
        Parameters:
        viewInteraction - The ViewInteraction to which the ViewComponent belongs
        x - The x positon of the new DialogBox
        y - The y positon of the new DialogBox
        Returns:
        Null if there is no DialogBox available for the ViewComponent

      • updateLabel

        public boolean updateLabel(Component component,
                           java.lang.String label)
        Update the label of the ViewComponent
        Parameters:
        component - The component that belongs to the ViewComponent
        label - The new label
        Returns:
        True if the label of the given component had to be updated False if the label of the given component had to be updated
